# Program Structure Docs

> Documentation for Program Structure Docs.

- [Coding Conventions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/program-structure/coding-conventions.md): Learn more about: Visual Basic Coding Conventions

- [Conditional Compilation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/program-structure/conditional-compilation.md): Learn more about: Conditional Compilation in Visual Basic

- [How to: Break and Combine Statements in Code](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/program-structure/how-to-break-and-combine-statements-in-code.md): Learn more about: How to: Break and Combine Statements in Code (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Collapse and Hide Sections of Code](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/program-structure/how-to-collapse-and-hide-sections-of-code.md): Learn more about: How to: Collapse and Hide Sections of Code (Visual Basic)
- [How to: Create XML Documentation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/program-structure/how-to-create-xml-documentation.md): Learn more about: How to: Create XML Documentation in Visual Basic

- [Keywords as Element Names in Code](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/program-structure/keywords-as-element-names-in-code.md): Learn more about: Keywords as Element Names in Code (Visual Basic)
